survey_name: AI-Powered Virtual Meeting Assistant User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on user experiences with AI-powered virtual meeting assistants to improve functionality and user satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use an AI-powered virtual meeting assistant?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use an AI-powered virtual meeting assistant?
